TopicTitle: Science module that needs a kerbonaut

Articles.Content:
Hello you all :3

Well, I think that it would be really nice to be able to send a space lab to a station and have to keep a kerbal there to do experiments. Could be a nice source for science points, and also another reason to keep a space station up there...

A lab version of the hitchhiker capsule basically...

Add some weight so you wont just use it for ecerything.
